title: Farming Simulator 15
notes: Game installs fine. Game launches from Steam. Goes into black screen right after launch, but I hear sounds/music from the introduction logo's. After logo music, still no menu screen, or other graphics.

title: Farming Simulator 15
notes: Runs perfectly, to get around the black screen problem put in the "set launcher options" this: "PROTON_VARIABLE=1 nod3d11" so the game runs in DirectX 9 Mode.

title: Farming Simulator 15
notes: At first blackscreen, after applying the settings described by others here ("PROTON_VARIABLE=1 nod3d11" in launcher options and editing the game.xml file to not start in fullscreen) it runs perfectly

gpu: X.Org Radeon RX 580 Series (POLARIS10, DRM 3.26.0, 4.18.12-arch1-1-ARCH, LLVM 7.0.0)
notes: Game performance is great. However, you should use PROTON_USE_WINED3D11 rather than DXVK if running fullscreen. The menu screen is completely black unless you alt-tab out and back in while in full screen mode. If you don't use this option whilst in fullscreen mode, if you alt tab out and back in the game you may encounter a black screen until you restart it. Game appears to work fine windowed mode.
title: Farming Simulator 15
